description: Try our easy to follow Easy Cranberry Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Easy Cranberry Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.47 cup hearty red wine or port

recipeInstructions.text: Bring the fresh or frozen cranberries, shallot, brown sugar, wine, and orange zest and juice and to a boil in a medium saucepan over medium heat, stirring often to dissolve the sugar.
Reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer, stirring, for 10-12 minutes, or until all of the cranberries skins have burst. Let cool.
Transfer to a bowl and serve chilled or at room temperature.
